basics.name: Emerson David Warhman
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Over 2 years of experience developing and maintaining web applications, servers, and database systems for the transportation, health, and finance sectors. Developed an application to request towing services for vehicles from a mobile device. Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, React Native, Expo, Ant Design, Express, MySQL, MongoDB, GraphQL. Experienced in efficiently and securely using AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Cloudfront, Lambda). A technology enthusiast, constantly expanding my knowledge to apply it to my projects.

work.name: MyTeamAbroad
work.summary: Developed a system to request towing services through a mobile application. Designed the database using MySQL and a socket system for clients and drivers to interact. Automated deployment and testing processes using GitHub Actions, improving productivity and efficiency during development.

work.name: LeaderDAO.ai
work.summary: Participated in the creation of a blockchain web platform offering financial and cryptocurrency savings services to users. Developed websites using React.js and Styled Components, connected the application to smart contracts using Ethers.js and GraphQL. Also performed unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.

work.name: Consultfinhn
work.summary: Supported an administrative website for a pediatric clinic. Extended site functionalities to allow doctors to track patient medical histories and schedule new appointments, notifying both patients and doctors. The platform is used by clinic doctors to attend to over 40 patients monthly.

projects.name: Unete Neopediatrica
projects.description: Back-office website for pediatric clinic doctors. Manages medical histories, visualizes diagnostic charts, and schedules appointments.

projects.name: Instatow
projects.description: Platform to request towing services via an app. Features real-time service status, user and driver location tracking.

projects.name: LeaderDao
projects.description: Community-driven DAO and decentralized fundraising platform, allowing members to access and contribute to new and existing projects.

projects.name: Neurofrequencies
projects.description: Mobile application for health treatment using the innovative method of neurofrequencies. Allows planning treatments and receiving constant notifications.

projects.name: Clockwork
projects.description: System for gradual and automated payroll payments in cryptocurrencies using smart contracts. Manages frequent payments, plans future payments, and handles existing ones.

projects.name: HopNow
projects.description: Online tourism platform. Allows users to select a tourist site anywhere in the world and experience a tour with a specialized guide.
